As all the blasts convrged on hellpeon, the Infecticon laughed. 
Before any of them struck him the field of Chaochitan energy once 
again surrounded his body as each shot struk the massive beat 
creating a large explosion. Once again as the smoke cleared the being 
seemed unphased that is until Darkfate flew up to him and spoke. 
Before the blast he fired sturck the bot it seemingly flew down 
straight at the trainers base, if it hit the shields it would likely 
be a devestating hit if it hit the ground it would leave a very large 
crater. The being turned to Darkfate and tilted its head to the side.

Hellpeon: "...Warrior? I am the Infecticon Enforcer Hellpeon... As 
for an alliance my leader may consider it if you help destroy that 
base and all in it..."
 
--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Darkfate::
> 
> Darkfate took off and opened his comm link in all Predacons 
> Frecuencies "To all Drillbit's, Killfest's and BlackFortress's 
> troops" said the male"Stop firing... I'll try to do somethign..."
> 
> The male flew towards Hell Peon and said to him "YOu're a good 
> warrior... Who're you and what's your faction? perhaps we can make 
an 
> alliance..."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Slayer::
> > 
> > Slayer is hit by one shot from the Trainer base, cursing to 
> himself. 
> > He was a friggin' member of the Trainers, and the base was firing 
> at 
> > him! He knew why, but he was still a bit ticked at it.
> > 
> > Flying back, Slayer aims his shoulder blasters and fires several 
> > shots at Hellpeon.
